channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: GloRilla Turns Up Indianapolis With Fiery 2025 WNBA All-Star Game Halftime Show Performance
item.description: GloRilla brought 🔥 to the 2025 WNBA All-Star Game halftime show in Indianapolis! Who else caught that electrifying performance? 🎶🏀 #GloRilla #WNBA2025

item.title: Working Men’s Club’s Sydney Minsky Sargeant shares new single ‘Long Roads’: “It’s OK to love and say that within a song”
item.description: 🎶 Dive into the heartfelt lyrics of @work1ngmensclub's Sydney Minsky Sargeant on their latest single 'Long Roads'! 💕🎸 #NewMusicAlert #WorkingMensClub

item.title: Charli XCX and the 1975’s George Daniel Marry in London Ceremony
item.description: Love is in the air! 🎶💕 Charli XCX and George Daniel tie the knot in a magical London ceremony! #MusicLove

item.title: Metallica Help EDM Fest Tomorrowland Open On Schedule After Stage Fire
item.description: 🔥 Metallica to the rescue! 🎸🎶 Tomorrowland stage fire doesn't stop the show! 🙌 #Metallica #Tomorrowland #MusicHeroes

item.title: Tyler, the Creator Unveils New Album ‘Don’t Tap the Glass’ Will Release on Monday
item.description: 🚨 Tyler, the Creator is dropping a new album, 'Don’t Tap the Glass' this Monday! Who's ready to vibe? 🎶🔥 #NewMusicAlert
